text: @HillaryClinton Sorry Hillary, but have to call BS on you...again. Against “expert” advice, @realDonaldTrump closed travel to/from China in January, before any COVID-19 deaths in the U.S.  There were only a handful of cases in the U.S. and our President acted quickly and authoritatively.
